Articles.Content: Is there some place I can find and download the most current mechjeb that is NOT, IS NOT CURSE.COM??? I have had issues with that site in the past and would prefer to avoid that site if at all possible. That 1 mod will make or BREAK my ability to play this game. Look, I am not here to be told I suck by my reliance on that mod, I am here trying to find its location OTHER than curse.com, so, I beg, please help.

If you want the really, really, really latest and cutting-edge dev builds, you can try the project's Jenkins repository (use at own risk).
